Question: This person stated that the most important battle to fight was overcoming his own demons, fears, and insecurities.
Hints: This person was somewhat of a food faddist taking his own goat to travels so he could always have fresh milk.
Rabindranath Tagore is said to have accorded the title to this person.
For ****, education is 'the moral development of the person', a process that is by definition 'lifelong'.
